context_bundle.summary: PhiGEN: Code generation tool for PhiLaunch ecosystem. Template-based scaffolding for PowerShell, Rust, Python, Batch. Generates scripts from natural language prompts. Integrated with PhiLaunch deployment pipeline.

onboarding.quick_start: PhiGEN generates code from prompts. Usage: New-CodeFromPrompt -Prompt 'Remove old files' -Language PowerShell. Templates for common patterns. Output validated, tested, ready-to-deploy.
common_patterns: Supports: PowerShell, Rust, Python, Batch, AHK
